comments.body:
Mind adding a unit test for this method to confirm its behavior? Could be a simple one like
https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/5adc84ce5e4270a08846975b4e3952bc99a3715f/tests/utils/test_string_utils.py#L12

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@

def conv_longdate_to_str(longdate, local_tz=True):
    date_time = datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(longdate / 1000.0)
    str_long_date = date_time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
